Description: Our distinct gated community is conveniently located in central Prince Georges County. We are in close proximity to the University of Maryland, recreational parks, shopping malls, Metro Rail, and downtown Washington DC. We are also just off of the Beltway (495, 95) and very close to the Baltimore-Washington Parkway (295), and much more.

Description: The comfortable feeling begins before you ever set foot in one of our apartments for rent in Hyattsville, Maryland. To begin with, theres ample free parking for you and your guests. As you look around, you realize that our community is close to shopping, dining, entertainment, major highways and walking distance to a future Metro station everything you care about. Step inside and your comfort is complete. The one- and two-bedroom apartments are spacious and filled with light streaming through large windows. The eat-in kitchens feature upgraded cabinets and gas ranges. Then theres the courteous, attentive service that ROSS Management Services is famous for. All things considered, this must be your lucky day. You started out looking for an apartment in Hyattsville, MD, and ended up finding a home at Bedford Station Apartments/Victoria Station Apartments.

Description: Built along a beautiful ridge and surrounded by tall trees, Suburban Hill has always been one of Silver Spring's Top Rated Apartment Communities. Ongoing renovations are being handled by a dedicated staff. Suburban Hill offers huge, comfortable apartments with swimming pool, fitness center, free parking, and other amenities. Just a mile from the Beltway, residents have easy access to the University of Maryland, shopping, restaurants, and public transportation. Most importantly, you can depend on our dedicated on-site staff to insure your living is easy.

Whether is it is enjoying a dip in the pool, having a relaxing evening on your balcony, or walking to shopping and entertainment, you can do it all at Villas at Langley Gardens. Our community provides residents with appealing apartments and a location that makes it easy to use commute using either public transportation or their own car. Villas at Langley is the place to live.

Welcome to Bedford Station
Convenient location. Close to malls, restaurants and shopping. Easy accessible to metro and minutes from the I495. Bedford Station offers comfortable and spacious one and two bedroom apartments. Eat in kitchens, upgraded cabinets, and wall-to-wall carpet or hardwood floors with unique floor plans. For the value and convenience you deserve, Bedford Station Apartments. Call us today to arrange a tour of your new home.

Description: Liberty Place in the Langley Park neighborhood of Hyattsville, MD offers spacious 1 and 2 bedroom apartments. We're at the center of everything you need. Public transportation is at your doorstep, including 8 Ride-On and Metro Buses with service to 9 MetroRail stations. Walk to grocery stores, services, restaurants and more! 5 minutes to the Beltway (I-495/I-95), the Washington DC border, Takoma Park, Siglo Creek Park, Duck Pond Park and the Lane Manor Recreation Center & Pool. Apartment features include lots of windows (we provide blinds), roomy galley-style kitchen with gas range and lots of storage. Gas and electricity included in rent. We provide one window AC unit per apartment (you may buy a 2nd AC unit and pay a fee for extra electricity May - September). Cats are welcome. Property features include , laundry in your apartment building or a short walk away, mail delivery inside each apartment building, on-site management office, and 24-hour emergency maintenance. For more information and availability, visit www.livelibertyplace.com.

Description:
Enjoy easy access to the Metropolitan Washington, DC area from our Silver Spring apartments at Langley Gardens. In a location that offers shopping and Metro bus services nearby, as well as a shuttle bus service to the University of Maryland. Our residents enjoy
central air conditioning, spacious interiors, ceramic tile bathrooms, thermal pane windows, on-site laundry facilities, professionally landscaped and community recreation room. Call Us Today!
